thread.title: Sheikh Mohammed offers condolences to Mohammed Al Ramaithi and Musbih Al-Fattan
thread.title_full: Sheikh Mohammed offers condolences to Mohammed Al Ramaithi and Musbih Al-Fattan

author: Staff
title: Sheikh Mohammed offers condolences to Mohammed Al Ramaithi and Musbih Al-Fattan
text:
Sheikh Mohammed offers condolences to Mohammed Al Ramaithi and Musbih Al-Fattan By Published   
His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President, Prime Minister and Ruler of Dubai today offered condolences to retired Major General Mohammed Rashid Al-Rumaithi and Lt. General Musabbah Rashid Al Fattan on the death of their mother. 
Sheikh Mohammed was accompanied by Dubai Crown Prince His Highness Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Chairman of Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Foundation His Highness Sheikh Ahmed bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, and Director- General of the Department of Protocol and Hospitality in Dubai Khalifa Saeed Suleiman. 
While visiting the mourning majlis at Jumeirah in Dubai, Sheikh Mohammed expressed his heartfelt condolences to the sons of the deceased. He also prayed to Allah the Almighty to rest his soul in peace.
